description.value: The nosferatu can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Telekinetic Haul] (heightened to half their level rounded up) three times per day and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vampiric Exsanguination] twice per day as a divine innate spell. They use a high DC for their level.
